showScoreExcerpt:
"Where this show is seriously entertaining, it is also thought provoking. Leguizamo makes a strong case for the Latin people having more rights to be in America than Americans...There are lines that are so funny and sadly truthful...He manages to create an important discussions on race and intolerance, while discussing it as comedic theatre. Leguizamoâ€™s brilliance has come a long way. Taccone directs this piece with panache and flair...This is a lesson we all need."
